WorkItem.Description:
If you use right-click to make selection rectangles, and move your mouse out of the area of the TreeViewEx in a certain way, you can make lots of little rectangles that stay on the component.

1) Click-and-hold RMB inside
2) Drag cursor outside
3) Release RMB
4) Move mouse back inside
5) Click-and-hold RMB inside
repeat from step 2

You can make lots of rectangles like in the screenshot, and I can't find a way to remove them either. (Resizing or populating the TreeViewEx doesn't do anything to them)
